CustomField.description: When set to TRUE, any approved billable Time Logs not yet invoiced will be added to this Billing Event. Note: Only applies where Billing Cycle is Manual
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When set to TRUE, any approved billable Time Logs not yet invoiced will be added to this Billing Event. Note: Only applies where Billing Cycle is Manual
CustomField.label: Auto Add Time Logs
